title: Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
text: RStudio projects colleagues different structure? difficult navigate understand others’ projects? even project months/years ago? Therefore, useful agree standard folder structure analysis. Templates can help enforce . package provides one standard project folder structure template R projects geared towards DAU analysis use cases. Whenever start new project RStudio, package provides standard folder structure directly code editor. Also, can help improving reproducibility using git renv.

text: create new project folder structure shown , follow steps: Install package Restart RStudio creating new RStudio project “New directory” option, choose “DAU project template” initialization can select want include package structure (check “Include folders files required build R package (recommended).”) can select want generate GitHub suitable .gitignore file (check “Create .gitignore file GitHub”) ’ve created project, provided instructions create git repository project connect GitHub/Azure DevOps.

title: Creates a standard folder structure for DAU projects in RStudio
text: new project contains following folder structure:
code: |-- 01_Data |   |-- 01_Raw |   `-- 02_Clean |-- R |   |-- load_data.R |   |-- helpers.R |   |-- src |-- tests |   |-- testthat.R |   |-- testthat |   |   |-- test-load_data.R |   |   |-- test-helpers.R |-- 02_Analysis |   |-- analysis.Rmd |   |-- analysis.qmd |-- 03_Documentation |   |-- 01_text |   `-- 02_figures |-- 04_Outputs |   |-- 01_results               |   |-- 02_figures               |   `-- 03_tables     |-- 05_Misc |   |-- 01_public               |   |-- 02_priv |-- README.md |-- proj_name.Rproj |-- .gitignore |-- .Rprofile |-- renv
